===Etymology 1===

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あがりおり|上がり|tr1=agari|t1=rising, going up|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|上がる}} ''agaru'', “to rise, to go up”|下り|tr2=ori|t2=descending, going down|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|下りる}} ''oriru'', “to descend, to go down”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あがりおり}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|あがりさがり}}

# to [[ascend]] and [[descend]], to [[go]] [[up]] and go [[down]]

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あがりさがり|上がり|tr1=agari|t1=rising, going up|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|上がる}} ''agaru'', “to rise, to go up”|下がり|tr2=sagari|t2=coming down, hanging down|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|下がる}} ''sagaru'', “to come down, to hang down”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あがりさがり|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR|acc2=0|acc2_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あがりさがり}}

# [[rise]] and [[fall]], [[fluctuation]] {{qualifier|as a level of something, such as a price}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|あがりさがり}}

# to [[rise]] and [[fall]], to [[fluctuate]] {{qualifier|as a level of something, such as a price}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あ|o1=げ|お|o2=ろし}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あげおろし|上げ|tr1=age|t1=raising, lifting up|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|上げる}} ''ageru'', “to raise something, to lift something up”|下ろし|tr2=oroshi|t2=lowering, bringing down|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|下ろす}} ''orosu'', “to lower something, to bring something down”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あげおろし|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|上げ下ろし}}, {{ja-l|揚げ卸し}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あげおろし}}

# [[raising]] and [[lowering]] of something
# [[loading]] and [[unloading]] {{qualifier|as of the cargo in a ship}}
# [[weaving]] on a [[loom]] {{qualifier|from the way the [[warp]] is raised and lowered}}

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|箸の上げ下ろしにも文句を言う|はし の あげおろし に も もんく を いう}}: “to complain about [how someone] raises and lowers their chopsticks” → to be extremely [[fastidious]] and [[nitpicky]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あ|o1=げ|くだ|o2=し}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あげくだし|上げ|tr1=age|t1=raising, lifting up|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|上げる}} ''ageru'', “to raise something, to lift something up”|下だし|tr2=kudashi|t2=putting something down; passing something through one's gut|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|下す}} ''kudasu'', “to put something down; to pass something through one's gut”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あげくだし|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あげくだし}}

# [[bringing up|bringing something back up]] and [[passing]] something → [[vomiting]] and having [[diarrhea]]

===Etymology 5===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|あ|o1=げ|さ|o2=げ}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あげさげ|上げ|tr1=age|t1=raising, lifting up|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|上げる}} ''ageru'', “to raise something, to lift something up”|下げ|tr2=sage|t2=lowering something, hanging something down|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|下げる}} ''sageru'', “to lower something, to hang something down”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|あげさげ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あげさげ}}

# [[raising]] and [[lowering]] of something
# {{qualifier|more specifically}} the [[raising]] and [[lowering]] of [[price]]s
# [[praising]] and [[berating]] someone
# [[good]] times and [[bad]] times]], [[thick and thin]]
# the [[start]] and [[finish]] of something {{qualifier|such as the process of setting a table for a meal, and then clearing up afterwards}}
# the [[ebb and flow]] of the [[tides]]

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|上げ下げを取る|あげさげ を とる}}: “to take [get] the ups and downs” → to [[match]] the [[rhythm]]s of a partner in doing something
{{der-bottom}}

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|あげさげ}}

# to [[raise]] and [[lower]] something
# {{qualifier|more specifically}} to [[raise]] and [[lower]] [[price]]s
# to [[praise]] and [[berate]] someone
# to [[start]] and [[finish]] something {{qualifier|such as the process of setting a table for a meal, and then clearing up afterwards}}
# to [[ebb and flow]], such as the [[tides]]

===Etymology 6===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|うえ|した}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=うえした|上|tr1=ue|t1=up|下|tr2=shita|t2=down}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|うえした|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|うえした|hhira=うへした}}

# [[up]] and [[down]], the [[upper]] and the [[lower]]
# the [[nobility]] and the [[commoners]]
# {{qualifier|in reference to western-style clothing}} [[upper]] [[clothing]] {{qualifier|such as shirts and jackets}} and [[lower]] clothing {{qualifier|such as trousers and socks}}
# [[outerwear]] and [[underwear]]
# [[upside-down]]

=====Idioms=====
{{der-top|Idioms}}
* {{ja-r|上下の合方|うえした の あいかた}}: “up and down accompaniment [music]” → a kind of music played during [[kabuki]] performances, where one person plays [[samisen]], another sings the low part, and another sings the high part
{{der-bottom}}

{{ja-pron|yomi=k|かみしも|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

## {{qualifier|more specifically}} [[upstream]] and [[downstream]]
## {{qualifier|more specifically}} [[upstage]] and [[downstage]]

## {{qualifier|more specifically}} the [[city]] and the [[countryside]]
## {{qualifier|more specifically}} the [[upper]] [[body]] and the [[lower]] body
## {{qualifier|more specifically}} the [[first]] three lines and the [[last]] two lines of a traditional [[waka]] [[poem]]

{{ja-pron|yomi=k|かみしも|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|か|o1=り|め|o2=り}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かりめり|上り|tr1=kari|t1=rising in tone|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|上る}} ''karu'', “to rise in tone”|下り|tr2=meri|t2=falling in tone|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|下る}} ''meru'', “to fall in tone”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Etymology 9===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|しょう|か}}
{{IPAchar|/ɕauka/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕɔːka/}} → {{IPAchar|/ɕoːka/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょうか}} compound {{m|zh|上下|tr=dzyang<sup>H</sup> hæ<sup>X</sup>|lit=up and down}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''soeng<sup>6</sup> haa<sup>6</sup>'' or {{etyl|hak|-}} ''song-ha''.

The [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]], so likely a later borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|しょうか|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|しょうか|hhira=しやうか}}

# [[up]] and [[down]]
# the [[upper]] and the [[lower]] {{qualifier|especially, the rulers and the ruled}}
# [[rising]] and [[falling]]
# an [[exchange]] of [[opinion]]s

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|しょうか|hhira=しやうか}}

# to [[rise]] and [[fall]]
# to [[exchange]] [[opinion]]s

===Etymology 10===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|じょう|か}}
{{IPAchar|/d͡ʑauka/}} → {{IPAchar|/d͡ʑɔːka/}} → {{IPAchar|/d͡ʑoːka/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょうか}} compound {{m|zh|上下|tr=dzyang<sup>H</sup> hæ<sup>X</sup>|lit=up and down}}. Compare modern {{etyl|nan|-}} alternative reading ''chiūⁿ hā''.

A mixed reading, using the [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] of ''jō'' and the [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]] of ''ka''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|じょうか|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じょうか|hhira=じやうか}}

# [[high]] [[grade]] and [[low]] grade
# the [[upper]] and [[lower]] [[house]]s of the [[Diet]] or [[parliament]]

====Verb====
{{ja-verb-suru|じょうか|hhira=じやうか}}

# to [[ascend]] and [[descend]], to [[climb]] [[up]] and climb [[down]]

===Etymology 11===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|じょう|げ}}
{{IPAchar|/d͡ʑauge/}} → {{IPAchar|/d͡ʑɔːge/}} → {{IPAchar|/d͡ʑoːge/}}

From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょうか}} compound {{m|zh|上下|tr=dzyang<sup>H</sup> hæ<sup>X</sup>|lit=up and down}}. Compare modern {{etyl|yue|-}} reading ''soeng<sup>6</sup> haa<sup>6</sup>'', {{etyl|hak|-}} ''song-ha'', or {{etyl|nan|-}} alternative reading ''chiūⁿ hā''.

The [[呉音#Japanese|goon]] reading, so likely the initial borrowing.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|じょうげ|acc=1|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じょうげ|hhira=じやうげ}}

# the [[high]] and the [[low]], the [[upper]] and the [[lower]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=しょうげ'|clothing}} a [[suit]], a [[set]] of [[clothing]] consisting of [[garment]]s for the [[upper]] and [[lower]] [[body]]
# [[rising]] and [[falling]], [[ascent]] and [[descent]]
# the [[city]] and the [[country]] {{qualifier|the city is considered “up”}}
# [[north]] and [[south]] {{qualifier|north is considered “up”}}
# [[volume]]s one and two of a two-volume [[book]] or other [[document]]
# [[roundtrip]] [[travel]] on a river, going both [[upstream]] and [[downstream]]
# [[high]] [[rank]] and [[low]] rank
# the [[nobility]] and the [[commoner]]s
# the [[lord]] and the [[minister]]s
# the [[old]] and the [[young]]
# an [[exchange]] of [[word]]s, a [[discussion]], [[question]] and [[answer]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|上下向|じょうげこう}}: travelling to the city from the country and travelling to the country from the city
* {{ja-r|上下水道|じょうげ すいどう}}: [[water]] and [[sewer]] [[pipe]]s, water and sewer [[service]]s
* {{ja-r|上下付け|じょうげづけ}}, {{ja-r|上下付|じょうげづけ}}: a kind of poetry game where either the first and last lines of a [[haiku]] are provided and the players must invent an appropriate middle line, or the first two kana are provided and the players must also use these as the last two kana, and invent an appropriate middle

* {{ja-r|上下二連銃|じょうげ にれん じゅう}}: an [[over/under]] [[shotgun]]
{{der-bottom}}

# to [[exchange]] [[word]]s, to [[discuss]], to [[question]] and [[answer]]
